explanation: mean annual daily mean air temperatures averaged over 1 year
mean diurnal range of temperatures averaged over 1 year
ratio of diurnal variation to annual variation in temperatures
standard deviation of the monthly mean temperatures

longname: mean daily maximum air temperature of the warmest month
explanation: The highest temperature of any monthly daily mean maximum temperature

longname: mean daily minimum air temperature of the coldest month
explanation: The lowest temperature of any monthly daily mean maximum temperature
The difference between the Maximum Temperature of Warmest month and the Minimum Temperature of Coldest month

longname: mean daily mean air temperatures of the wettest quarter
explanation: The wettest quarter of the year is determined (to the nearest month)

longname: mean daily mean air temperatures of the driest quarter
explanation: The driest quarter of the year is determined (to the nearest month)

longname: mean daily mean air temperatures of the warmest quarter
explanation: The warmest quarter of the year is determined (to the nearest month)

longname: mean daily mean air temperatures of the coldest quarter
explanation: The coldest quarter of the year is determined (to the nearest month)

longname: precipitation amount of the wettest month
explanation: The precipitation of the wettest month.

longname: precipitation amount of the driest month
explanation: The precipitation of the driest month.
The Coefficient of Variation is the standard deviation of the monthly precipitation estimates expressed as a percentage of the mean of those estimates (i.e. the annual mean)

longname: mean monthly precipitation amount of the wettest quarter
explanation: The wettest quarter of the year is determined (to the nearest month)

longname: mean monthly precipitation amount of the driest quarter
explanation: The driest quarter of the year is determined (to the nearest month)

longname: mean monthly precipitation amount of the warmest quarter
explanation: The warmest quarter of the year is determined (to the nearest month)
